results.title: A 79-Year-Old Woman With Dyspnea and Hypoxemia That Worsened in an Upright Position.
results.text_hl: A 79-Year-Old @SPECIES_9606 @@@Woman@@@ With @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Dyspnea@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@Hypoxemia@@@ That Worsened in an Upright Position.

citations.NLM: van der Veer T, In 't Veen JCCM, den Dekker WK, Miedema J. A 79-Year-Old Woman With Dyspnea and Hypoxemia That Worsened in an Upright Position. Chest. 2017 Dec;152(6):e139-e142. PMID: 29223273

results.title: [A case of drug-induced pneumonia possibly associated with simvastatin].
results.text_hl: A 59-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ was admitted because of general @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Cough @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@ and progressive @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@ about 5 months after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Yoshioka S, Mukae H, Ishii H, Nakayama S, Hisatomi K, Ishimoto H, Kakugawa T, Sugiyama K, Ide M, Kohno S. [A case of drug-induced pneumonia possibly associated with simvastatin]. Nihon Kokyuki Gakkai Zasshi. 2005 Oct;43(10):600-4. PMID: 16285592
